ci_gates.docs: fails build if any invalid rows found

notes: Email dataset analysis complete. Found 420 total emails with Gmail ID pattern matching ^1[0-9a-f]{15}$. No validation violations detected - all emails have valid message IDs, non-empty subjects, substantial content (>=5 chars), and reasonable timestamps. No duplicate content detected. Created 420 content_unified entries for vector pipeline integration. Pre-embedding validation gate is active to prevent future invalid data ingestion. Vector reconciliation created missing content entries but embeddings generation would require embedding service activation.
